headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: The Last Team Standing Update Now Available
content:
The Last Team Standing Update introduces powerful weaponry, tactical gear, high-performance vehicles and all-new Creator features.

With the LTS Creator Mode, you can now design original GTA Online Jobs in this strategic and deadly mode that pits teams against one another with no second chances.

This update features 10 new Last Team Standing Jobs and lots of additional changes and tweaks to GTA Online. Youâ€™ve only got one life, use it wisely.
